JustSudoku-0.8.0.0: GTK+/Terminal Haskell Sudoku app

GTK+/Terminal Haskell Sudoku app

Modules

  • Sudoku
    • Control
      • Sudoku.Control.Move Defines valid Moves and MoveErrors for Sudoku application.
      • Sudoku.Control.Parse Methods for parsing moves and for creating locations and squares.
    • Data
      • Sudoku.Data.Board Methods and datatypes for creating and manipulating Sudoku Boards.
